tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Phani Kiran sir is legend of Orthopaedic in the world great Doctor support to patients with always he is speaking way recovery very soon always recommend god gift of Chennai

tags: None
review:
This is my second visit to Ojas Clinic. My leg pain is almost gone now. Dr. Ashwin referred me to check Dr. Phani Kiran to make sure that there are no further issues with my leg. Dr. Phani took a lot of time to assess my situation and understand the issue. He physically examined my leg and confirmed that there is nothing to worry and the pain must have be caused by muscle strain. 

Our meeting was about 15 to 20 mins. He answered all mine and my wife's questions and also shared some advises to avoid this kind of issues in the future. 

To my surprise, neither Dr. Ashwin or Dr. Phani charged me for this visit. Stating that this is only a review, they didnt charge me anything for the consultation. Really surprised!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Sir, listened fully & then told to walk , then toe walk, heel walk . Then moved both the legs in particular postures. Thereafter x- ray to be more clear . Further the reason for the hip pain & then the medication & physiotherapist refernce. So everything done & explained in toto with clarity & confidence.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
After a thorough examinations, Dr gave me all confidence and executed Endoscopic Discectomy procedure very diligently. I’m overwhelmingly impressed with his treatment.

Overall,  Dr is very friendly and highly approachable.  

Ojas Ortho centre provides brilliant professional service and all staff working there are very courteous and highly supportive.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I strongly suggest not to visit this doctor. ** ******* **** *** ** **** ** **** i have severe lower back pain for several years due to a physical injury during childhood.he looked at my MRI and said that i have a malformed tailbone that is rubbing against the top vertebrae. he did not listen to my narrative of what caused the pain. said surgery was not needed and asked to go in for an injection, a day care proceedure which costs 30k. I felt sad and visited another doctor for a second opinion, ** ***** ** ***** ***** *** ***** ***** *********** **** ****** ********* ** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** ** ***** *** ****** ***** **** **** ****** *** ***** **** ** **** *** *

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: The first visit was on 1st December and 2nd visit was on 8th December, during first visit when I asked regardin fee for second visit clinik people said it will be Rs. 300 if it is within one month, but they have charged 900 ( consultation 500+physiotherapy 400)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very good in explaining the issues and explaining the root causes as well. He gave suggestions to change the lifestyle to culminate the pain caused by improper postures and long sitting and exercise less lifestyle ad well. I strongly recommend him for spine related illnesses. Happy to share the feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** *** ** *** **** ** *** ***** I went for neck pain treatment. Sir examined me for more than 15 minutes and he has gone through the test reports and explained everything patiently in simple terms. I've been getting better gradually. I strongly recommend Phani sir to others!

tags: None
review: The doctor was so patiently listening to all the problems, he was analyzing where the problem is exactly by holding the hand, slowly twisting and bending it. He was clearly explaining us the problem and advised us to take physiotherapy for 10 days. He asked me to take the medicine only if required, during pain. He was so kind and I was satisfied with his treatment. Thank you.
